text:
(1) Recreations--Swimming: Seeking relief from the heat, these children find Central Park a good cooling-off place.
About 1928

(2) In the fountain of Civic Virtue, City Hall Park, Manhattan.
P. L. Sperr
1932

(3) This beach is in Tompkins Square Park, on the lower East Side.
P. L. Sperr
Jult, 1930
title: Recreation and hobbies - Children playing.
